TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthentication extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Web 应用程序管理 Forms 身份验证服务。

span.span: Manages forms-authentication services for Web applications.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体身份验证，用户和密码验证的 Web 应用程序不需要 Windows 身份验证。Forms authentication enables user and password validation for Web applications that do not require Windows authentication. 使用窗体身份验证，用户信息存储在外部数据源，如数据库，或在应用程序的配置文件中。With forms authentication, user information is stored in an external data source, such as a database, or in the configuration file for an application. 一旦用户进行身份验证，窗体身份验证都维护在 cookie 中或在 URL 中的身份验证票证，以便经过身份验证的用户不需要提供与每个请求的凭据。Once a user is authenticated, forms authentication maintains an authentication ticket in a cookie or in the URL so that an authenticated user does not need to supply credentials with each request. 通过设置启用 forms 身份验证`mode`的属性[身份验证](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100))到的配置元素`Forms`。Forms authentication is enabled by setting the `mode` attribute of the [authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element to `Forms`. 你可以要求对应用程序的所有请求使用都包含有效的用户身份验证票证[授权](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100))拒绝任何未知的用户的请求，如下面的示例中所示的配置元素。You can require that all requests to an application contain a valid user authentication ticket by using the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element to deny the request of any unknown user, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 在上一示例中，ASP.NET 页，属于应用程序的任何请求需要由窗体身份验证提供一个有效的用户名称。In the previous example, any request for an ASP.NET page that is part of the application requires a valid user name that is supplied by forms authentication. 如果用户名不存在，则将请求重定向到已配置。If no user name exists, then the request is redirected to the configured . 类提供对方法和属性，可以使用对用户进行身份验证的应用程序中访问。The class provides access to methods and properties that you can use in an application that authenticates users. 方法将浏览器重定向到已配置的用户能够登录到应用程序。The method redirects a browser to the configured for users to log into an application. 方法将身份验证的用户重定向回原始受保护的 URL 请求或。The method redirects an authenticated user back to the original protected URL that was requested or to the . 也有必要使你能够管理 forms 身份验证票证的方法。There are also methods that enable you to manage forms-authentication tickets, if needed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了使用 ASP.NET 成员资格提供程序的窗体身份验证并要求所有用户进行身份验证的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application that uses the ASP.NET membership provider for forms authentication and requires all users to be authenticated. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例显示了使用 forms 身份验证和 ASP.NET 成员资格的 ASP.NET 应用程序的登录页。The following code example shows the login page for an ASP.NET application that uses forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/logincs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/loginvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 进行身份验证方法验证用户凭据存储在[凭据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100))部分中的应用程序配置文件。The Authenticate method verifies user credentials that are stored in the [credentials](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100)) section of the application configuration file. 或者，可以使用 ASP.NET 成员资格来存储用户凭据和调用以验证凭据。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials and call the to verify the credentials. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 为了提高安全性，可以加密密码存储在应用程序的配置文件使用方法。For improved security, you can encrypt passwords stored in the configuration file for an application by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了存储在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中的用户凭据。The following code example shows user credentials stored in the Web.config file for an application. 密码值具有已哈希运算使用方法。The password values have been hashed using the method. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` 下面的代码示例显示了使用一个登录页面方法来验证用户凭据。The following code example shows a login page that uses the method to validate user credentials. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性会反映出的值`cookieless`的属性[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。The property reflects the value for the `cookieless` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 属性确定是否将在浏览器中的会话 cookie 中存储值，或将其存储在属性。The property determines whether the value will be stored in a session cookie in the browser or stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 当值存储在 URI 中，生成的 URI 的长度可能会超过允许的最大长度。When the value is stored in the URI, the length of the generated URI may be longer than the maximum length allowed. 这是最有可能发生时属性设置为应用程序名称和应用程序名称太长 （40 或多个字符），应用程序中的用户名称时时间很长，或者长字符串存储在值。This is most likely to occur when the property is set to the application name and the application name is long (40 or more characters), when user names in the application are long, or when long strings are stored in the value. 如果生成的 URI 太长，Web 服务器会返回`400 - Bad Request`错误。If the generated URI is too long, the Web server will return a `400 - Bad Request` error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`cookieless`属性为`AutoDetect`Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute to `AutoDetect` in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回一个值，该值基于值和浏览器的功能。The property returns a value based on the value and the capabilities of the browser. - 如果属性设置为，则属性将返回`true`。If the property is set to , the property will return `true`. - 如果属性设置为，则属性将返回`false`。If the property is set to , the property will return `false`. - 如果属性设置为，则属性将返回`true`如果浏览器支持 cookie，cookie 是已启用; 否则为属性将返回`false`。If the property is set to , the property will return `true` if the browser supports cookies and cookies are enabled; otherwise, the property will return `false`. - 如果属性设置为，则属性将返回`true`如果当前支持 cookie 和重定向使用 cookie; 否则为属性将返回`false`。If the property is set to , the property will return `true` if the for the current supports both cookies and redirecting with cookies; otherwise, the property will return `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`cookieless`属性为Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `cookieless` attribute to in the Web.config file. 此配置将导致属性返回`false`。This configuration will result in the property returning `false`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值设置为使用`enableCrossAppRedirects`的属性[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。The property value is set using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 中检查属性方法时重定向 URL 未指向当前应用程序中的页。The property is checked within the method when the redirect URL does not point to a page in the current application. 如果是`true`，然后执行重定向; 如果是`false`，将浏览器重定向到定义中的页属性。If is `true`, then the redirect is performed; if is `false`, the browser is redirected to the page defined in the property. > [!NOTE] > 跨应用程序重定向页，请一定要确保将特定属性中[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))已经过身份验证的应用程序之间重复的配置元素。When you redirect pages across applications, you must make sure that specific attributes in the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element are duplicated across the authenticated applications. 有关详细信息和示例，请参阅[跨应用程序的窗体身份验证](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7)。For more information and an example, see [Forms Authentication Across Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7). > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果允许跨应用程序重定向，你的站点将容易受到攻击，将用户定向到恶意 Web 站点，但为您的网站使用的登录页。When cross-application redirects are allowed, your site is vulnerable to an exploit that directs users to a malicious Web site but uses the login page for your site. 始终验证重定向 URL 返回的方法是预期，以便确保允许重定向仅到已批准的网站的 URL。Always verify that the redirect URL that is returned by the method is a URL that you expect so that you can make sure that you allow redirects only to approved Web sites. 您还必须验证重定向 URL 使用适当的协议 （HTTP 或 HTTPS）。You must also verify that the redirect URL uses the appropriate protocol (HTTP or HTTPS). 若要执行这些验证，可以将回发事件处理程序添加到您的登录页，也可以添加的处理程序事件的控件。To perform these verifications, you can add a postback event handler to your login page, or you can add a handler for the event of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`enableCrossAppRedirects`属性为`true`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute to `true` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你想要在而不是使用应用程序代码中执行重定向时，可以使用此方法方法。You can use this method when you want to perform the redirect in your application code instead of using the method. 方法返回在查询字符串中使用指定的 URL`ReturnURL`变量名称。The method returns the URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`，则方法返回的返回 URL `caller.aspx`。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method returns the return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果`ReturnURL`变量不存在，方法返回中的 URL属性。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method returns the URL in the property. 将浏览器重定向到登录页时，ASP.NET 会自动添加的返回 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 默认情况下，`ReturnUrl`变量必须引用当前应用程序中的页面。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果`ReturnUrl`指的是在不同的应用程序或不同的服务器上的页面方法返回中的 URL属性。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the methods returns the URL in the property. 如果你想要允许的返回 URL 来指代当前应用程序之外的网页，则必须设置属性设置为`true`使用`enableCrossAppRedirects`的属性[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。If you want to allow the return URL to refer to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 此方法不会创建一个 cookie。This method does not create a cookie. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性设置为`true`以允许跨应用程序重定向是潜在的安全威胁。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重定向到 URL 身份验证的用户返回从方法。The following code example redirects authenticated users to the URL returned from the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个哈希的密码值，用于存储 forms 身份验证凭据的应用程序配置文件中。The method creates a hashed password value that can be used when storing forms-authentication credentials in the configuration file for an application. 通过使用存储在应用程序配置文件的身份验证凭据方法以验证应用程序的用户的密码。Authentication credentials stored in the configuration file for an application are used by the method to verify passwords for users of an application. 或者，可以使用 ASP.NET 成员资格来存储用户凭据。Alternatively, you can use ASP.NET membership to store user credentials. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For more information, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用用户名、 密码和哈希类型，并显示[凭据](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100))包含用户定义和经过哈希处理的密码的配置节。The following code example takes a user name, password, and hash type and displays the [credentials](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/e01fc50a(v%3dvs.100)) section of the configuration that includes the user definition and hashed password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重定向到指定查询字符串中使用的 URL`ReturnURL`变量名称。The method redirects to the URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`，则方法将重定向到返回 URL `caller.aspx`。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method redirects tothe return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果`ReturnURL`变量不存在，方法将重定向到中的 URL属性。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method redirects to the URL in the property. 将浏览器重定向到登录页时，ASP.NET 会自动添加的返回 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 默认情况下，`ReturnUrl`变量必须引用当前应用程序中的页面。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果`ReturnUrl`指的是在不同的应用程序或不同的服务器上的页面方法将重定向到中的 URL属性。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the methods redirects to the URL in the property. 如果你想要允许重定向到当前应用程序之外的网页，则必须设置属性设置为`true`使用`enableCrossAppRedirects`的属性[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。If you want to allow redirects to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性设置为`true`以允许跨应用程序重定向是潜在的安全威胁。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 如果属性是`true`，并将`ReturnUrl`变量位于当前应用程序或属性是`true`，则方法发出身份验证票证，并将其放入默认 cookie 使用方法。If the property is `true`, and either the `ReturnUrl` variable is within the current application or the property is `true`, then the method issues an authentication ticket and places it in the default cookie using the method. 如果是`false`和重定向路径是到当前应用程序中的 URL，作为重定向 URL 的一部分颁发票证。If is `false` and the redirect path is to a URL in the current application, the ticket is issued as part of the redirect URL. 如果是`false`，是`true`，和重定向 URL 不是指当前应用程序中的页面方法发出身份验证票证，并将其放入属性。If is `false`, is `true`, and the redirect URL does not refer to a page within the current application, the method issues an remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重定向到在查询字符串中使用指定的返回 URL`ReturnURL`变量名称。The method redirects to the return URL specified in the query string using the `ReturnURL` variable name. 例如，在 URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`，则方法将重定向到返回 URL `caller.aspx`。For example, in the URL `http://www.contoso.com/login.aspx?ReturnUrl=caller.aspx`, the method redirects tothe return URL `caller.aspx`. 如果`ReturnURL`变量不存在，方法将重定向到中的 URL属性。If the `ReturnURL` variable does not exist, the method redirects to the URL in the property. 将浏览器重定向到登录页时，ASP.NET 会自动添加的返回 URL。ASP.NET automatically adds the return URL when the browser is redirected to the login page. 默认情况下，`ReturnUrl`变量必须引用当前应用程序中的页面。By default, the `ReturnUrl` variable must refer to a page within the current application. 如果`ReturnUrl`指的是在不同的应用程序或不同的服务器上的页面方法将重定向到中的 URL属性。If `ReturnUrl` refers to a page in a different application or on a different server, the method redirects to the URL in the property. 如果你想要允许重定向到当前应用程序之外的网页，则必须设置属性设置为`true`使用`enableCrossAppRedirects`的属性[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。If you want to allow redirects to a page outside the current application, you must set the property to `true` using the `enableCrossAppRedirects` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置属性设置为`true`以允许跨应用程序重定向是潜在的安全威胁。Setting the property to `true` to allow cross-application redirects is a potential security threat. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. 如果属性是`true`，并将`ReturnUrl`变量位于当前应用程序或属性是`true`，则方法发出身份验证票证，并将其放入指定的 cookie`strCookiePath`参数使用方法。If the property is `true`, and either the `ReturnUrl` variable is within the current application or the property is `true`, then the method issues an authentication ticket and places it in the cookie specified by the `strCookiePath` parameter using the method. 如果是`false`和重定向路径是到当前应用程序中的 URL，作为重定向 URL 的一部分颁发票证。If is `false` and the redirect path is to a URL in the current application, the ticket is issued as part of the redirect URL. 如果是`false`，是`true`，和重定向 URL 不是指当前应用程序中的页面方法发出身份验证票证，并将其放入属性。If is `false`, is `true`, and the redirect URL does not refer to a page within the current application, the method issues an authentication ticket and places it in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值使用 ASP.NET 应用程序配置文件中设置`requireSSL`的属性[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。The property value is set in the configuration file for an ASP.NET application by using the `requireSSL` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 您可以指定 Web.config 文件中的 ASP.NET 应用程序是否需要 SSL （安全套接字层） 以便通过设置窗体身份验证 cookie 返回到服务器`requireSSL`属性。You can specify in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application whether SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is required to return the forms-authentication cookie to the server by setting the `requireSSL` attribute . 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . 建议，如果你配置`requireSSL`作为`false`，还配置`slidingExpiration`作为`false`，从而缩短票证的有效时间量。It is recommended that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`requireSSL`Web.config 文件中的属性。The following code example sets the `requireSSL` attribute in the Web.config file. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法： 将窗体身份验证票证添加到的 cookie 集合或 URL，如果是`false`。The method adds a forms-authentication ticket to either the cookies collection or the URL if is `false`. 窗体身份验证票证窗体身份验证信息提供给浏览器所做的下一个请求。The forms-authentication ticket supplies forms-authentication information to the next request made by the browser. 使用窗体身份验证，可以使用方法时您想要对用户进行身份验证，但仍保留并可重定向对导航的控制。With forms authentication, you can use the method when you want to authenticate a user but still retain control of the navigation with redirects.

summary.span: 从浏览器删除 Forms 身份验证票证。

span.span: Removes the forms-authentication ticket from the browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 cookie 或 URL 删除窗体身份验证票证信息，如果是`false`。The method removes the forms-authentication ticket information from the cookie or the URL if is `false`. 可以使用方法结合方法来注销一个用户，并允许其他用户登录。You can use the method in conjunction with the method to log one user out and allow a different user to log in. 如果需要特殊的业务逻辑来执行移除匿名标识符后，如果以独占方式在无 cookie 模式下运行，或者如果支持经过身份验证和匿名用户，则应显式控制重定向到登录页。If you run exclusively in cookieless mode, or if you support both authenticated and anonymous users, you should explicitly control the redirect to the login page if you require special business logic to execute as a result of removing the anonymous identifier. 当方法调用时，通过调用来发出的重定向到应用程序的登录页方法替换`endResponse`参数设置为`false`。When the method is called, a redirect to the application's login page is made by calling the method with the `endResponse` parameter set to `false`. 重定向之后才会发生当前页已完成执行，以便可以运行其他代码。The redirect does not take place until the current page has finished executing, so additional code can be run. 如果代码不包含显式重定向到另一个页面，则会将用户重定向到应用程序的配置文件中配置的登录页。If the code does not contain an explicit redirect to another page, the user is redirected to the login page configured in the application's configuration file. 调用方法只会删除窗体身份验证 cookie。Calling the method only removes the forms authentication cookie. Web 服务器不存储更高版本的比较有效和过期的身份验证的票证。The Web server does not store valid and expired authentication tickets for later comparison. 这使您的网站很容易遭受重播攻击，如果恶意用户获取有效的窗体身份验证 cookie。This makes your site vulnerable to a replay attack if a malicious user obtains a valid forms authentication cookie. 若要使用窗体身份验证 cookie 时提高安全性，应执行以下操作：To improve security when using a forms authentication cookie, you should do the following: - 通过设置窗体身份验证 cookie 使用绝对到期属性设置为`false`。Use absolute expiration for forms authentication cookies by setting the property to `false`. 这就限制了可以在其中重播被劫持的 cookie 的窗口。This limits the window in which a hijacked cookie can be replayed. - 只能颁发并接受身份验证 cookie，请通过安全套接字层 (SSL)，通过设置属性设置为`true`和通过在整个网站在 SSL 下运行。Only issue and accept authentication cookies over Secure Sockets Layer (SSL), by setting the property to `true` and by running the entire Web site under SSL. 设置属性设置为`true`可确保，ASP.NET 会永远不会将身份验证 cookie 发送到浏览器通过非 SSL 连接; 但是，客户端可能不接受该 cookie 的安全设置。Setting the property to `true` ensures that ASP.NET will never send an authentication cookie to the browser over a non-SSL connection; however, the client might not honor the secure setting on the cookie. 这意味着客户端可能发送窗体身份验证 cookie 通过非 SSL 连接，从而使其易受到攻击。This means the client might send the forms authentication cookie over a non-SSL connection, thus leaving it vulnerable to hijack. 您可以防止客户端通过在整个网站在 SSL 下运行以明文形式发送窗体身份验证 cookie。You can prevent a client from sending the forms authentication cookie in the clear by running the entire Web site under SSL. - 在服务器上使用持久性存储来记录用户在注销网站，以及如何将应用程序事件如事件以确定当前用户是否已验证的窗体身份验证。Use persistent storage on the server to record when a user logs out of the Web site, and then use an application event such as event to determine whether the current user was authenticated with forms authentication. 如果用户进行身份验证使用窗体身份验证，并且如果在持久性存储区中的信息指示用户已注销，立即清除身份验证 cookie 并将浏览器重定向回登录页。If the user was authenticated with forms authentication, and if the information in persistent storage indicates the user is logged out, immediately clear the authentication cookie and redirect the browser back to the login page. 在成功登录后更新存储以反映用户已登录。After a successful login, update storage to reflect that the user is logged in. 当使用此方法时，应用程序必须跟踪的用户登录的状态，并必须强制执行空闲用户注销。When you use this method, your application must track the logged-in status of the user, and must force idle users to log out. ## Examples 下面的代码示例清除使用窗体身份验证 cookie方法和重定向到登录名用户页上使用方法。The following code example clears the forms-authentication cookie using the method and redirects the user to the login page using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/CS/signoutcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthentication/VB/signoutvb.aspx#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值设置为使用`slidingExpiration`的属性[窗体](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100))配置元素。The property value is set using the `slidingExpiration` attribute of the [forms](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/1d3t3c61(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element. 可调过期重置为有效的身份验证 cookie 的到期时间，如果发出请求，并且有超过一半的超时间隔已过。Sliding expiration resets the expiration time for a valid authentication cookie if a request is made and more than half of the timeout interval has elapsed. 如果 cookie 已过期，用户必须重新进行身份验证。If the cookie expires, the user must re-authenticate. 设置属性设置为`false`可以提高安全性的应用程序通过限制有效，身份验证 cookie 的时间基于已配置`timeout`值。Setting the property to `false` can improve the security of an application by limiting the time for which an authentication cookie is valid, based on the configured `timeout` value. 我们建议，如果你配置`requireSSL`作为`false`，还配置`slidingExpiration`作为`false`，从而缩短票证的有效时间量。We recommend that if you configure `requireSSL` as `false`, you also configure `slidingExpiration` as `false`, to reduce the amount of time for which a ticket is valid. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置`slidingExpiration`属性为`false`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。The following code example sets the `slidingExpiration` attribute to `false` in the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. ``` ```
